    • Constructor Detail

      • World

        public World(int width,
             int height)
        Creates the virtual world with the given dimension. To populate the world with objects from xml use the build(String xmlLocation) function
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the virtual world
        height - the height of the virtual world

        public boolean isGameOver()
        It is true when fatal collision happened.
        Returns:

      • checkForCollisions

        public void checkForCollisions(AutomatedCar car)
        Iterate trought all the collidable objects from the world. If collision happens set the speed of the car, or ends the "game".
        Parameters:
        car - AutomatedCar provides the current controleld AutomatedCar.

      • isColliding

        public boolean isColliding(WorldObject a,
                           WorldObject b)
        Check if the 2 given WorldObject collide.
        Parameters:
        a - a WorldObject to check
        b - a WorldObject to check
        Returns:
        true if they collide, false if they not.
